    Description
    default void
    EngineExecutionListener.fileEntryPublished(TestDescriptor testDescriptor, FileEntry file)
    Can be called for any TestDescriptor in order to attach a file to a test or container — for example: Screenshots Logs Output files written by the code under test

    Method
    Description
    static Condition<Event>
    EventConditions.fileEntry(Predicate<FileEntry> predicate)
